dataIdInfo.idCredit: Created by the geneGIS team: Dori Dick, Shaun Walbridge, Scott Baker, Dawn Wright
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This tool will create a line feature class that joins encounter locations of the same individual over time and space. This tool does not account for barriers to individual movement (e.g., land) and does not correctly represent the true path an individual traveled.

This tool was developed to work with a data set that contains repeated sightings of known individuals over time and space such as migratory movement in whales.

tool.name: IndividualPaths

param.displayname: Source features (to link with selected individuals)
param.name: Source_Feature_Class
param.dialogReference:
The full dataset to search for the individuals.

Note: this tool will also work on a selected set of individuals (records).

param.name: Primary_Identification_Column
param.dialogReference: The identification column used to determine individual identity. In many cases this will be the Individual_ID, but could also be another identifer field.

param.name: Output_Feature_Class
param.dialogReference: Output line feature class that contains each individual path as a separate feature.

tool.usage: Create individual paths, which link a set of individuals across all locations where they have been observed. Assumes linear movement betwen locations and does not correctly represent an individual's true movement path.
tool.summary:
This tool will create a line feature class that joins encounter locations of the same individual over time and space. This tool does not account for barriers to individual movement (e.g., land) and does not correctly represent the true path an individual traveled.

This tool was developed to work with a data set that contains repeated sightings of known individuals over time and space such as migratory movement in whales.
